title: SH 183 Photos Irving
text:
Reconstruction and expansion of the SH 183 took place from 2015 to 2018. The corridor was entirely rebuilt and substantially widened. Unfortunately, there are still only three regular lanes in each direction, with 2x2 tolled managed lanes in the middle section of the freeway.

The Irving Interchange at Loop 12 was officially dedicated on May 8, 2024.

These views are going westbound from Loop 12 to Belt Line.

images.caption: Westbound, entering the freeway at Loop 12, the Irving Interchange. The Irving Interchange was officially dedicated on May 8, 2024.
Westbound, west of Carl Road at the O'Connor exit.
On the railroad overpass, O'Connor is the next intersection ahead.
This view is much further west, approaching the exit for DFW Airport.
